Name: Brian Lane
Description: Coding, Creativity, and a Passion for Spaceflight

roles.title: Application Engineer
description: I serve as the code owner of the Diners Club Globalnet application, where I've led significant modernization efforts. I'm responsible for all deployments and enhancements to this critical system, ensuring its continued evolution and optimal performance.

My role involves designing, implementing, and documenting software changes while providing extensive testing and support both internally and externally. I actively participate in analysis, design, testing, and review processes, providing accurate estimations of work based on requirements.

I write detailed product specifications, designs, and technical manuals, and evaluate third-party products and specifications. Leveraging my experience and knowledge of the environment, I make informed development decisions and maintain responsibility for assigned tasks. Additionally, I educate both technical and non-technical team members on areas of my expertise and provide development-level support throughout the product lifecycle.

roles.title: Software Engineer II
description: As a Software Engineer II at NCR Voyix, I have been responsible for designing, modifying, implementing, and documenting software application changes. My role involves extensive testing and support for applications both internally and externally. I actively participate in analysis, design, testing, and review processes, providing accurate estimations of work based on requirements.

I write detailed product specifications, designs, and technical manuals, and evaluate third-party products and specifications. Leveraging my experience and knowledge of the environment, I make informed development decisions and maintain responsibility for assigned tasks. Additionally, I educate both technical and non-technical team members on areas of my expertise and provide development-level support throughout the product lifecycle.

roles.title: Web Development Supervisor
description: Manages development of the presentation layer for UPS.com applications.
I work with cross-functional teams and vendors to deliver web pages that are accurate, on time, and meet WCAG/brand standards.
In this role I manage web development specialists as well as offshore resources.

roles.title: Web Development Specialist
description: Lead developer on Shipping app for the Digital Experience team since May 2018
Intimate knowledge of UPS systems, architecture and design
Offshore as well as on site management and coordination of other developers

Projects.Name: Personal Portfolio Website
Projects.Description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Material-UI. Features include a dynamic experience timeline, skill visualization, project showcase, and contact form. The site implements modern UI practices like glass-morphism, subtle animations, and responsive design. Built using React 18, Material-UI v5, and styled-components for custom theming. Implements best practices in component architecture and responsive web design.

Education.Description: Concentration: Graphics and Human Computer Interaction

About: I am a passionate software engineer with a strong background in web development, specializing in creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces. With a keen eye for design and a love for problem-solving, I strive to deliver impactful solutions that enhance user experiences.
